aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.subTitle: Our Promise
description: Welcome to MATJO - BBQ & HOTPOT in Dresden Neustadt.
Our restaurant combines the best traditions of BBQ and hotpots to offer you a unique culinary experience.
With us, you create your meal according to your taste! Fresh ingredients, authentic flavors, and warm service await you in a relaxed atmosphere.
Spend an unforgettable evening here with your loved ones or get it delivered to you and experience the variety of our cuisine!

valueList.heading: Quality
valueList.description: We focus on fresh, high-quality ingredients to guarantee an exceptional taste experience.

valueList.heading: Authenticity
valueList.description: We value traditional preparation methods and recipes to offer you an authentic experience.

valueList.heading: Hospitality
valueList.description: Warmth and friendliness are the heart of our service, so you feel right at home with us.

valueList.heading: Community
valueList.description: Food brings people together, and at MATJO, sharing and enjoying is at the core of our experience.

faqList.title: How is our BBQ served?
faqList.content: Alongside the numerous meat/vegetable dishes and other items, many side dishes are served, known in Korean cuisine as 'Banchan'. These include kimchi, pickled vegetables, and rice. The grilled dishes are wrapped in lettuce leaves and dipped in sauces and spices.

faqList.title: What ingredients are in the hotpot?
faqList.content: Our hotpot contains a variety of fresh ingredients such as vegetables, meat, and noodles, which you can combine as you like.

faqList.title: Are there vegetarian options?
faqList.content: Yes, we offer a selection of vegetarian ingredients for the hotpot, as well as special vegetarian BBQ dishes.

faqList.title: Can allergies be accommodated?
faqList.content: Absolutely! Please inform our staff about your allergies so that we can prepare a safe and delicious meal for you.

faqList.title: Are reservations required?
faqList.content: We recommend making reservations, especially on weekends, to ensure you get a table. However, walk-ins are also welcome!
